channel.title: Has any class been added to the game after being posted in this forum?
channel.description: Has any member of the community posted an idea for a new class here, and then that class or something obviously based on it, was added to the game?

item.title: Has any class been added to the game after being posted in this forum?

item.description:
That reminds me.

Time to make unbalanced classes

Read full topic

item.source: Has any class been added to the game after being posted in this forum?

item.title: Has any class been added to the game after being posted in this forum?
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Realistically I feel if you are putting a lot of time and effort into making the classes you are wasting your time because so many classes are made by rarely any classes get accepted or are used. IMO a persons time is worth more than the chance of having a class accepted. I mean if you really want to have a class or classes implemented into some form of change in this forum a person could implement them into an SFOL and the in game use might change some of the FOL classes (SFOL 18). But otherwise I wouldn’t recommend making any classes.

Read full topic

item.title: Has any class been added to the game after being posted in this forum?
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
All I’m really trying to say is I like how they have somewhat constant updates with balance changes. I would like to see some new stuff added to the game soon but I understand that it takes time(still really want new stuff soon). I am also against inqu/sorc. Don’t think they need to be in the game, but then again that’s my opinion.
